body:
Silo does not compile on Ubuntu 18-20 while requesting for silex (configure --enable-silex=yes).
In spack, Silo now compiles after adding the libXmu dependency.
Before, there was an error at ax_try_4 line 28101 because -lXmu was not found,
the message was 'Failed to find matching components of a complete Qt installation'.
Moreover, support for szip compresssion is added.
title: Silo: make it compile with +silex on Ubuntu18-20 platform
